title: Colors of Abidjan
location: National Museum of Ivory Coast, Abidjan
description: A vibrant exhibition showcasing the works of local artists inspired by the city's culture and landscapes.

title: Heritage in Motion
description: An interactive art installation exploring the traditions and evolution of Ivorian dance and music.

title: Abidjan International Art Festival
description: A week-long celebration of contemporary African art, featuring exhibitions, performances, and panel discussions with international artists.

title: Submit Your Artwork for the 2024 Exhibition
description: Artists are invited to submit their work for consideration in the upcoming 2024 Contemporary Art.A call for photographers to contribute to a special series on urban life in Ivory Coast, to be featured in an international publication.

title: Global Art Exchange Program
description: An initiative connecting Ivorian artists with international peers to exchange ideas and collaborate on joint projects.
